data.title: Willis & Gambier Ivory 1 Drawer Bedside Chest
meta_keywords: bedside chests ivory 1 drawer bedside chest
low value products (ppc) ivory 1 drawer bedside chest
data.meta_description: Willis & Gambier Ivory 1 Drawer Bedside Chest - French Inspired Bedroom Furniture - Cream Colour - Free Delivery - Smiths The Rink Harrogate
data.text:
The Willis Gambier Ivory 1 Drawer Bedside Chest has a single drawers with a pull out shelf for convenience. This bedside has a fixed lower rattan shelf with beautifully carved legs and mouldings around the top of the unit.

The Ivory bedroom range offers a french inspired bedroom range with a cream painted finish that has been distressed with a rub off finish. The cabinets have dovetail joints on the drawers and antique bronze styled handles.

Distressed Painted finish

Delivered fully assembled

Dovetailed drawer

Cream painted finish

Carved legs and mouldings

Poplar & birch wood

1 Drawer - 1 pull out shelf

Lower rattan storage shelf

Antique bronze handles

Premier 2 Man Home Delivery – Normally Delivered By Our Own Teams

Most UK Mainland Postcodes (Excluding Scottish highlands, Cornwall & Areas of Wales - please see list of excluded postcodes*)

Free Delivery & Assembly on Orders within 50 Miles of our store

Non Assembly Items - Free Delivery on orders over £749 To Most UK Postcodes* unless specified - Clearance items not included

Free Delivery & Assembly on orders over £849 To Most UK Postcodes* unless specified - Clearance items not included

Professional 2 man delivery teams - Over 99.9% of orders delivered by our own teams

Delivery day & 2 Hour Time slot confirmed with you once your order has arrived on our warehouse**

Items delivered to your room of choice

All packaging removed & disposed

Bedframes, Manually Operated Ottomans & Recliners assembled (please contact us for information of assembly on other items)

Old bed or furniture removal service on delivery (charges may apply) - see below

Drivers when requested can also call you when en-route to your address

We aim to deliver to you within 10-15 working days of order being placed when items are shown as “in stock”

**All deliveries are arranged in advance and only when the time and date have been accepted by you

APC Delivery (Next working day courier) - UK Mainland

Next working day delivery on in stock items (orders placed before 1pm Mon-Fri, excluding bank holidays)

Tracking number provided

We cannot ship to Northern Ireland

*Scottish Highlands Postcodes - please contact us for delivery information as some areas are excluded by our couriers

Royal Mail

Same day despatch on in stock items (orders placed Mon-Friday before 1pm (Excluding bank holidays)

Sent recorded delivery

First & second class option available

Collect in-store

In stock items available for collection by cardholder (original copy of order required)

Please contact sales department to ensure your item is ready for collection

Disposal of existing furniture - Available On Our Premier 2 Man Delivery Service

Our teams can take your old furniture away on a like for like basis - we are charged by our recycling company as shown in the tariff below. This service is subject to availability - If you would like this service please let us know when initially placing your order and we will confirm.

Please contact our store for any queries on delivery

If you have any specific delivery requirements or timeframes please contact our sales department or leave a comment in the delivery notes section when placing your order.
